name: Capsule Survivor (Okhalme)
description:
Submission to the 2023 winter edition of My First GameJam. 

Pitch : Survive through the waves of enemies as you grow increasingly stronger. Each completed wave grants a reward ranging from mighty weapons to powerful magic spells.

Controls : Move (Arrow keys), Look at direction (Mouse), Melee Attack (Left click), Magic spell (right Click)

Assets used : 

  • VFX effects : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-remaster-free-109...
  • Environment : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/dungeons/ultimate-low-poly...
  • Musics : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/25-fantasy-rpg-game-tracks-mus...
  • SFX : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/rpg-essentials-sound-effect...
